p: Total flavonoid content (TFC) was measured using the method of Abeysinghe et al. (2007) with modifications. Briefly, each yogurt extract (100 μL) was mixed with diethylene glycol (500 μL) and NaOH (50 μL, 1 N). The mixture was incubated at 37°C for 60 min. The developed color in the mixture measured using an ELISA reader (Synergy 2; BioTek Instruments) at 420 nm. The TFC is expressed as quercetin equivalent (Sigma-Aldrich). A standard curve was generated using the quercetin standard solution, and the results are expressed as quercetin equivalent per milliliter.
